entry.title: golangci-lint ã‚’ GitHub Actions ã§ä½¿ã†
entry.summary: ã“ã‚Œã§ pull request æ™‚ã« golangci-lint ãŒèµ°ã‚‹ã€‚
entry.content:
golangci-lint ã¯ go vet ã‚’ã¯ã˜ã‚è¤‡æ•°ã® lint ã‚’é›†ç´„ã—ã¦çµæœã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹å„ªã‚Œã‚‚ã®ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ ã‹ã¤ã¦ã¯ GolangCI.com ã§ GitHub ã¨é€£æºã§ãã¦ã„ãŸã®ã ãŒï¼Œ2020å¹´4æœˆã§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã—ã¾ã„ï¼Œå¯‚ã—ã„é™ã‚Šã€‚

ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã„ãŸã®ã ãŒï¼Œã„ã¤ã®é–“ã«ã‹å…¬å¼ã® GitHub Actions ãŒç”¨æ„ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ãŸã€‚ æ°—ä»˜ã‹ãªã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€‚ ä¸è¦šã€‚

  • golangci/golangci-lint-action: Official GitHub action for golangci-lint from it’s authors

ä½¿ã„æ–¹ã¯ç°¡å˜ã€‚ ãƒªãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªã® .github/workflows/ ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã« YAML ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ï¼ˆä¾‹ãˆã° lint.ymlï¼‰ã‚’ç½®ãï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«è¨˜è¿°ã™ã‚‹ã€‚

name: golangci-lint
on:
  push:
    tags:
      - v*
    branches:
      - master
  pull_request:
jobs:
  golangci:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        go-version: [1.15.x]
        os: [ubuntu-latest, macos-latest, windows-latest]
    name: lint
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: golangci-lint
        uses: golangci/golangci-lint-action@v2
        with:
          # Required: the version of golangci-lint is required and must be specified without patch version: we always use the latest patch version.
          version: v1.31

          # Optional: working directory, useful for monorepos
          # working-directory: somedir

          # Optional: golangci-lint command line arguments.
          # args: --issues-exit-code=0

          # Optional: show only new issues if it's a pull request. The default value is `false`.
          # only-new-issues: true

ã¾ãŸï¼Œãƒªãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªç›´ä¸‹ã® .gitattributes ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ä»¥ä¸‹ã®è¨˜è¿°ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
